channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WY

item.title: Report X-2023120040
item.description:
Report X-2023120040

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: CASPER
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was brought in by driver as a damage inspection. the outbound admin checked it and found one of the bottles had a loose cap and some of the cleaner leaked out DescribePack: a cap on one of the bottles of cleaner was loose and leaked out on the other bottles and inside the box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: cap was closed and package was seperated from the rest of the packages until we can reconcile

item.title: Report X-2023111142
item.description:
Report X-2023111142

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-16
  • City: CHEYENNE
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: unloaders were unloading when they came up to it, pkg was leaking DescribePack: lid was not connected to a 2.5 gal jug DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: pkg was immediatley taken to a storage tote lined with hazmat bag and taken to hazmat area

item.title: Report X-2023110012
item.description:
Report X-2023110012

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-01
  • City: SINCLAIR
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: GATX 202185 released approximately 1/2 gallon of Diesel Fuel, the release was due to manway swing bolts being less than tool tight. GATX 202185 was secured and wiped down before going back into transportation.
